page.title: 08ABERDEEN INVERNESS RAILWAY
page.content:
Aberdeen Inverness Railway, Elgin
The Aberdeen_Inverness railway line runs from east to west through this D_block.It is a single_track line with passing_places. The movement of trains is controlled by the signal_man at Forres station. There are 8 or 9 passenger trains in each direction Mondays to Saturdays and 3 in each direction on Sundays. Many of the passengers are Service men and their families from the RAF stations at Kinloss and Lossiemouth. There are 2 goods trains one day and 3 the next.
